text:
【订购提醒】尊敬的用户您好！ 您于2024年10月04日 13:43:37通过省客服中心，
已订购：
1. 成功办理和飞享（2024版）38元档，标准资费38.0元/月，含国内语音200分钟，生效日期2024年10月04日，长期有效。
2. 成功办理湖南移动客服专属优惠5G区域通用流量12个月，生效日期2024年10月04日，失效日期2025年09月30日。
trans:
[Order Reminder] Dear user! You have subscribed to the following through the provincial customer service center
at 13:43:37 on October 4, 2024:
1. Successfully applied for the RMB38 package of Hefeixiang (2024 version), with a standard rate of RMB38.0/month, including 200 minutes of domestic voice calls, effective on October 4, 2024, and valid for a long time.
2. Successfully applied for the 12-month exclusive preferential 5G regional general traffic of Hunan mobile customer service, effective on October 4, 2024, and expired on September 30, 2025.
